categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back actors

nodes.text: Robin Scobey (born 1945) is an actor who is credited as playing one of five "Other Officers" in the Imperial Forces in the 1980 film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. According to the fan sites Aveleyman.com and Movie Dude's Pictorial Filmography of Screen Actors, Scobey played the Imperial officer identified as Lieutenant Venka in Star Wars Legends.
